title: HAP 37 - Liberty, Equality, Humanity - The Haitian Revolution
itunes:title: HAP 37 - Liberty, Equality, Humanity - The Haitian Revolution
description: In an age of revolutions and revolutionary ideas, the Haitian Revolution of 1791-1804 stands out as the most radical of them all.
